short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds multiple visual effects to Google search page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google search page will have many improvement now:

New tab favicon.
Favicons for search results.
New backgrounds, colors, fonts for search results.
Legend icons (PDF, ...) for direct links to documents files.
Frame to recognize Google frames.

Over 500 my favicons are built in addon. Others are loading from Google repository.
